title: what the actual....
body:
Hello dear staff. I was booted from my game for some wierd reason a few moments ago, and my client wouldnt work until i tinkered with it (with help from my dad who does IT) and was able to come back to my game and play the rest of it out with no issues.  but for some reason i got a penalty for leaving and was also placed in a lower priority que. can someone help me please. everything was connected and working properly on our end, yet i was kicked from the game for a few minutes, yet i still came back and played it out. can you guys help me removed this lower priority que? i played the game out when we fixed the issue.  please reply ASAP.

thanks

replies.body:
Disconnecting from a match negatively impacts everyone in it, regardless if it was intentional or not. This is a prime reason why all disconnections are treated equally by the system and why penalties cannot be modified or removed. 

I wasn't able to find any recorded service issues during the time you created this post, but if you see any further disconnections, please let me know.
The servers are currently experiencing technical difficulties. Riot is aware and working to resolve them. Apologies for the inconvenience.
